thread.title: Chris Cowan

author: Chris Cowan
title: Chris Cowan
text: We haven't gone on a vacation in a couple of years because I didn't have a dog sitter I could trust. Our dogs are rescues and pretty high maintenance. Our kids used to pup sit but they are all older now and moved out and weren't available and I didn't want to find a stranger on Craigslist and have them stay in my home. I found Dog Vacay on Facebook and thought I would give it a try. Since it was a dedicated service, I felt it would be safe to have them in my home and that they would provide competent care for my fur babies. I met Miyuki prior to hiring her and she was great. Dog Vacay is a fantastic service - thank you for giving us the peace of mind to go on vacation again!
